Body: Possible Duplicate:  Complete Dropbox implementation for Android  I am looking for a way to use a cloud service that will automatically download files onto my tablet for offline use. I am using Dropbox currently but to individually download each file which is a bit tedious. I did not see a way to do this in the Google Drive or Skydrive, android apps. Is there another service or a third party app that will let me do this or am I just stuck downloading each file one at a time?
